awards.text: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Farming family battles severe storms, a bank threatening to reposses their farm, and other hard times in a battle to save and hold on to their farm.
plot: Farming family battles severe storms, a bank threatening to reposses their farm, and other hard times in a battle to save and hold on to their farm.
title: The River
